Title: The Rise of the Reckoning
Description:
The Reckoning is ready!

Let's make these spiders pay. Blood for blood.
ObjectivesText: Board The Reckoning and slay 150 nerubian forces.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Find Faerin in the Ruptured Lake.
CompletionText: We will make the nerubians regret ever thinking they could push into our home!
